-00001a50: 2020 2023 2320 4150 490a 2020 2020 2020     ## API.      
-00001a60: 2020 4172 6775 6d65 6e74 7320 666f 7220    Arguments for 
-00001a70: 6041 562e 4175 746f 5669 7a28 2960 206d  `AV.AutoViz()` m
-00001a80: 6574 686f 643a 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a  ethod:.        .
-00001a90: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6066 696c 656e          - `filen
-00001aa0: 616d 6560 3a20 5573 6520 616e 2065 6d70  ame`: Use an emp
-00001ab0: 7479 2073 7472 696e 6720 2822 2229 2069  ty string ("") i
-00001ac0: 6620 7468 6572 6527 7320 6e6f 2061 7373  f there's no ass
-00001ad0: 6f63 6961 7465 6420 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65  ociated filename
-00001ae0: 2061 6e64 2079 6f75 2077 616e 7420 746f   and you want to
-00001af0: 2075 7365 2061 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65   use a dataframe
-00001b00: 3b20 7365 7420 6466 7465 2061 7320 7468  ; set dfte as th
-00001b10: 6520 6461 7461 6672 616d 6520 6e61 6d65  e dataframe name
-00001b20: 2e20 5072 6f76 6964 6520 6120 6669 6c65  . Provide a file
-00001b30: 6e61 6d65 2061 6e64 206c 6561 7665 2064  name and leave d
-00001b40: 6674 6520 656d 7074 7920 746f 206c 6f61  fte empty to loa
-00001b50: 6420 7468 6520 6461 7461 7365 742e 0a20  d the dataset.. 
-00001b60: 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 7365 7060 3a20         - `sep`: 
-00001b70: 4669 6c65 2073 6570 6172 6174 6f72 2028  File separator (
-00001b80: 636f 6d6d 612c 2073 656d 692d 636f 6c6f  comma, semi-colo
-00001b90: 6e2c 2074 6162 2c20 6f72 2061 6e79 2063  n, tab, or any c
-00001ba0: 6f6c 756d 6e2d 7365 7061 7261 7469 6e67  olumn-separating
-00001bb0: 2076 616c 7565 292e 0a20 2020 2020 2020   value)..       
-00001bc0: 202d 2060 6465 7056 6172 603a 2054 6172   - `depVar`: Tar
-00001bd0: 6765 7420 7661 7269 6162 6c65 2069 6e20  get variable in 
-00001be0: 796f 7572 2064 6174 6173 6574 3b20 6c65  your dataset; le
-00001bf0: 6176 6520 656d 7074 7920 6966 206e 6f74  ave empty if not
-00001c00: 2061 7070 6c69 6361 626c 652e 0a20 2020   applicable..   
-00001c10: 2020 2020 202d 2060 6466 7465 603a 2049       - `dfte`: I
-00001c20: 6e70 7574 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65 2066  nput dataframe f
-00001c30: 6f72 2070 6c6f 7474 696e 6720 6368 6172  or plotting char
-00001c40: 7473 3b20 6c65 6176 6520 656d 7074 7920  ts; leave empty 
-00001c50: 6966 2070 726f 7669 6469 6e67 2061 2066  if providing a f
-00001c60: 696c 656e 616d 652e 0a20 2020 2020 2020  ilename..       
-00001c70: 202d 2060 6865 6164 6572 603a 2052 6f77   - `header`: Row
-00001c80: 206e 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2074 6865 2068   number of the h
-00001c90: 6561 6465 7220 726f 7720 696e 2079 6f75  eader row in you
-00001ca0: 7220 6669 6c65 2028 3020 666f 7220 7468  r file (0 for th
-00001cb0: 6520 6669 7273 7420 726f 7729 2e0a 2020  e first row)..  
-00001cc0: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6076 6572 626f 7365        - `verbose
-00001cd0: 603a 2030 2066 6f72 206d 696e 696d 616c  `: 0 for minimal
-00001ce0: 2069 6e66 6f20 616e 6420 6368 6172 7473   info and charts
-00001cf0: 2c20 3120 666f 7220 6d6f 7265 2069 6e66  , 1 for more inf
-00001d00: 6f20 616e 6420 6368 6172 7473 2c20 6f72  o and charts, or
-00001d10: 2032 2066 6f72 2073 6176 696e 6720 6368   2 for saving ch
-00001d20: 6172 7473 206c 6f63 616c 6c79 2077 6974  arts locally wit
-00001d30: 686f 7574 2064 6973 706c 6179 2e0a 2020  hout display..  
-00001d40: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 606c 6f77 6573 7360        - `lowess`
-00001d50: 3a20 5573 6520 7265 6772 6573 7369 6f6e  : Use regression
-00001d60: 206c 696e 6573 2066 6f72 2065 6163 6820   lines for each 
-00001d70: 7061 6972 206f 6620 636f 6e74 696e 756f  pair of continuo
-00001d80: 7573 2076 6172 6961 626c 6573 2061 6761  us variables aga
-00001d90: 696e 7374 2074 6865 2074 6172 6765 7420  inst the target 
-00001da0: 7661 7269 6162 6c65 2069 6e20 736d 616c  variable in smal
-00001db0: 6c20 6461 7461 7365 7473 3b20 6176 6f69  l datasets; avoi
-00001dc0: 6420 7573 696e 6720 666f 7220 6c61 7267  d using for larg
-00001dd0: 6520 6461 7461 7365 7473 2028 3e31 3030  e datasets (>100
-00001de0: 2c30 3030 2072 6f77 7329 2e0a 2020 2020  ,000 rows)..    
-00001df0: 2020 2020 2d20 6063 6861 7274 5f66 6f72      - `chart_for
-00001e00: 6d61 7460 3a20 2773 7667 272c 2027 706e  mat`: 'svg', 'pn
-00001e10: 6727 2c20 276a 7067 272c 2027 626f 6b65  g', 'jpg', 'boke
-00001e20: 6827 2c20 2773 6572 7665 7227 2c20 6f72  h', 'server', or
-00001e30: 2027 6874 6d6c 2720 666f 7220 6469 7370   'html' for disp
-00001e40: 6c61 7969 6e67 206f 7220 7361 7669 6e67  laying or saving
-00001e50: 2063 6861 7274 7320 696e 2076 6172 696f   charts in vario
-00001e60: 7573 2066 6f72 6d61 7473 2c20 6465 7065  us formats, depe
-00001e70: 6e64 696e 6720 6f6e 2074 6865 2076 6572  nding on the ver
-00001e80: 626f 7365 206f 7074 696f 6e2e 0a20 2020  bose option..   
-00001e90: 2020 2020 202d 2060 6d61 785f 726f 7773       - `max_rows
-00001ea0: 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65 6460 3a20 4c69 6d69  _analyzed`: Limi
-00001eb0: 7420 7468 6520 6d61 7820 6e75 6d62 6572  t the max number
-00001ec0: 206f 6620 726f 7773 2066 6f72 2063 6861   of rows for cha
-00001ed0: 7274 2064 6973 706c 6179 2c20 7061 7274  rt display, part
-00001ee0: 6963 756c 6172 6c79 2075 7365 6675 6c20  icularly useful 
-00001ef0: 666f 7220 7665 7279 206c 6172 6765 2064  for very large d
-00001f00: 6174 6173 6574 7320 286d 696c 6c69 6f6e  atasets (million
-00001f10: 7320 6f66 2072 6f77 7329 2074 6f20 7265  s of rows) to re
-00001f20: 6475 6365 2063 6861 7274 2067 656e 6572  duce chart gener
-00001f30: 6174 696f 6e20 7469 6d65 2e20 4120 7374  ation time. A st
-00001f40: 6174 6973 7469 6361 6c6c 7920 7661 6c69  atistically vali
-00001f50: 6420 7361 6d70 6c65 2077 696c 6c20 6265  d sample will be
-00001f60: 2075 7365 642e 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d   used..        -
-00001f70: 2060 6d61 785f 636f 6c73 5f61 6e61 6c79   `max_cols_analy
-00001f80: 7a65 6460 3a20 4c69 6d69 7420 7468 6520  zed`: Limit the 
-00001f90: 6e75 6d62 6572 206f 6620 636f 6e74 696e  number of contin
-00001fa0: 756f 7573 2076 6172 6961 626c 6573 2074  uous variables t
-00001fb0: 6f20 6265 2061 6e61 6c79 7a65 642e 0a20  o be analyzed.. 
-00001fc0: 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 7361 7665 5f70         - `save_p
-00001fd0: 6c6f 745f 6469 7260 3a20 4469 7265 6374  lot_dir`: Direct
-00001fe0: 6f72 7920 666f 7220 7361 7669 6e67 2070  ory for saving p
-00001ff0: 6c6f 7473 2e20 4465 6661 756c 7420 6973  lots. Default is
-00002000: 204e 6f6e 652c 2077 6869 6368 2073 6176   None, which sav
-00002010: 6573 2070 6c6f 7473 2075 6e64 6572 2074  es plots under t
-00002020: 6865 2063 7572 7265 6e74 2064 6972 6563  he current direc
-00002030: 746f 7279 2069 6e20 6120 7375 6266 6f6c  tory in a subfol
-00002040: 6465 7220 6e61 6d65 6420 4175 746f 5669  der named AutoVi
-00002050: 7a5f 506c 6f74 732e 2049 6620 7468 6520  z_Plots. If the 
-00002060: 7361 7665 5f70 6c6f 745f 6469 7220 646f  save_plot_dir do
-00002070: 6573 6e27 7420 6578 6973 742c 2069 7420  esn't exist, it 
-00002080: 7769 6c6c 2062 6520 6372 6561 7465 642e  will be created.
-00002090: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a 2020 2020 2020  .        .

+00001530: 2020 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2023 2320      .        ##

+00001550: 7363 6f76 6572 2068 6f77 2074 6f20 7573  scover how to us

+00001670: 2049 6e73 7465 6164 2c20 7369 6d70 6c79   Instead, simply
+00001680: 2072 756e 3a0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 0a20   run:.        .

+000016b0: 746f 7669 7a20 696d 706f 7274 2041 7574  toviz import Aut
+000016c0: 6f56 697a 5f43 6c61 7373 0a20 2020 2020  oViz_Class.

+000016e0: 436c 6173 7328 290a 2020 2020 2020 2020  Class().

+00001700: 2866 696c 656e 616d 6529 0a20 2020 2020  (filename).     
+00001710: 2020 2060 6060 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a     ```.        .
+00001720: 2020 2020 2020 2020 4665 6564 2041 7574          Feed Aut
+00001730: 6f56 697a 2061 6e79 2069 6e70 7574 2066  oViz any input f
+00001740: 696c 656e 616d 6520 2869 6e20 4353 562c  ilename (in CSV,
+00001750: 2074 7874 2c20 6f72 204a 534f 4e20 666f   txt, or JSON fo
+00001760: 726d 6174 292c 2061 6e64 2073 6574 2060  rmat), and set `
+00001770: 6d61 785f 726f 7773 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65  max_rows_analyze
+00001780: 6460 2061 6e64 2060 6d61 785f 636f 6c73  d` and `max_cols
+00001790: 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65 6460 2062 6173 6564  _analyzed` based
+000017a0: 206f 6e20 6d65 6d6f 7279 206c 696d 6974   on memory limit
+000017b0: 6174 696f 6e73 2069 6e20 796f 7572 2065  ations in your e
+000017c0: 6e76 6972 6f6e 6d65 6e74 2c20 616e 6420  nvironment, and 
+000017d0: 7761 7463 6820 7468 6520 6d61 6769 6320  watch the magic 
+000017e0: 6861 7070 656e 210a 2020 2020 2020 2020  happen!.        
+000017f0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2041 7574 6f56 697a  .        AutoViz
+00001800: 2063 616e 206e 6f77 2063 7265 6174 6520   can now create 
+00001810: 6368 6172 7473 2069 6e20 6d75 6c74 6970  charts in multip
+00001820: 6c65 2020 666f 726d 6174 7320 7573 696e  le  formats usin
+00001830: 6720 7468 6520 6063 6861 7274 5f66 6f72  g the `chart_for
+00001840: 6d61 7460 2073 6574 7469 6e67 3a0a 2020  mat` setting:.  
+00001850: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 4966 2060 6368 6172        - If `char
+00001860: 745f 666f 726d 6174 203d 2770 6e67 2760  t_format ='png'`
+00001870: 206f 7220 6027 7376 6727 6020 6f72 2060   or `'svg'` or `
+00001880: 276a 7067 2760 3a20 4d61 7470 6c6f 746c  'jpg'`: Matplotl
+00001890: 6962 2063 6861 7274 7320 6172 6520 706c  ib charts are pl
+000018a0: 6f74 7465 6420 696e 6c69 6e65 2e0a 2020  otted inline..  
+000018b0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2a20 4361 6e20            * Can 
+000018c0: 6265 2073 6176 6564 206c 6f63 616c 6c79  be saved locally
+000018d0: 2028 7573 696e 6720 6076 6572 626f 7365   (using `verbose
+000018e0: 3d32 6020 7365 7474 696e 6729 206f 7220  =2` setting) or 
+000018f0: 6469 7370 6c61 7965 6420 2860 7665 7262  displayed (`verb
+00001900: 6f73 653d 3160 2920 696e 204a 7570 7974  ose=1`) in Jupyt
+00001910: 6572 204e 6f74 6562 6f6f 6b73 2e0a 2020  er Notebooks..  
+00001920: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2a20 5468 6973            * This
+00001930: 2069 7320 7468 6520 6465 6661 756c 7420   is the default 
+00001940: 6265 6861 7669 6f72 2066 6f72 2041 7574  behavior for Aut
+00001950: 6f56 697a 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20  oViz..        - 
+00001960: 4966 2060 6368 6172 745f 666f 726d 6174  If `chart_format
+00001970: 3d27 626f 6b65 6827 603a 2049 6e74 6572  ='bokeh'`: Inter
+00001980: 6163 7469 7665 2042 6f6b 6568 2063 6861  active Bokeh cha
+00001990: 7274 7320 6172 6520 706c 6f74 7465 6420  rts are plotted 
+000019a0: 696e 204a 7570 7974 6572 204e 6f74 6562  in Jupyter Noteb
+000019b0: 6f6f 6b73 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20  ooks..        - 
+000019c0: 4966 2060 6368 6172 745f 666f 726d 6174  If `chart_format
+000019d0: 3d27 7365 7276 6572 2760 2c20 6461 7368  ='server'`, dash
+000019e0: 626f 6172 6473 2077 696c 6c20 706f 7020  boards will pop 
+000019f0: 7570 2066 6f72 2065 6163 6820 6b69 6e64  up for each kind
+00001a00: 206f 6620 6368 6172 7420 6f6e 2079 6f75   of chart on you
+00001a10: 7220 6272 6f77 7365 722e 0a20 2020 2020  r browser..     
+00001a20: 2020 202d 2049 6620 6063 6861 7274 5f66     - If `chart_f
+00001a30: 6f72 6d61 743d 2768 746d 6c27 602c 2069  ormat='html'`, i
+00001a40: 6e74 6572 6163 7469 7665 2042 6f6b 6568  nteractive Bokeh
+00001a50: 2063 6861 7274 7320 7769 6c6c 2062 6520   charts will be 
+00001a60: 6372 6561 7465 6420 616e 6420 7369 6c65  created and sile
+00001a70: 6e74 6c79 2073 6176 6564 2061 7320 4854  ntly saved as HT
+00001a80: 4d4c 2066 696c 6573 2075 6e64 6572 2074  ML files under t
+00001a90: 6865 2060 4175 746f 5669 7a5f 506c 6f74  he `AutoViz_Plot
+00001aa0: 7360 2064 6972 6563 746f 7279 2028 756e  s` directory (un
+00001ab0: 6465 7220 776f 726b 696e 6720 666f 6c64  der working fold
+00001ac0: 6572 2920 6f72 2061 6e79 206f 7468 6572  er) or any other
+00001ad0: 2064 6972 6563 746f 7279 2074 6861 7420   directory that 
+00001ae0: 796f 7520 7370 6563 6966 7920 7573 696e  you specify usin
+00001af0: 6720 7468 6520 6073 6176 655f 706c 6f74  g the `save_plot
+00001b00: 5f64 6972 6020 7365 7474 696e 6720 2864  _dir` setting (d
+00001b10: 7572 696e 6720 696e 7075 7429 2e0a 2020  uring input)..  
+00001b20: 2020 2020 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a        .        .
+00001b30: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2323 2041 5049 0a20          ## API. 
+00001b40: 2020 2020 2020 2041 7267 756d 656e 7473         Arguments
+00001b50: 2066 6f72 2060 4156 2e41 7574 6f56 697a   for `AV.AutoViz
+00001b60: 2829 6020 6d65 7468 6f64 3a0a 2020 2020  ()` method:.    
+00001b70: 2020 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060      .        - `
+00001b80: 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 603a 2055 7365 2061  filename`: Use a
+00001b90: 6e20 656d 7074 7920 7374 7269 6e67 2028  n empty string (
+00001ba0: 2222 2920 6966 2074 6865 7265 2773 206e  "") if there's n
+00001bb0: 6f20 6173 736f 6369 6174 6564 2066 696c  o associated fil
+00001bc0: 656e 616d 6520 616e 6420 796f 7520 7761  ename and you wa
+00001bd0: 6e74 2074 6f20 7573 6520 6120 6461 7461  nt to use a data
+00001be0: 6672 616d 653b 2073 6574 2064 6674 6520  frame; set dfte 
+00001bf0: 6173 2074 6865 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65  as the dataframe
+00001c00: 206e 616d 652e 2050 726f 7669 6465 2061   name. Provide a
+00001c10: 2066 696c 656e 616d 6520 616e 6420 6c65   filename and le
+00001c20: 6176 6520 6466 7465 2065 6d70 7479 2074  ave dfte empty t
+00001c30: 6f20 6c6f 6164 2074 6865 2064 6174 6173  o load the datas
+00001c40: 6574 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6073  et..        - `s
+00001c50: 6570 603a 2046 696c 6520 7365 7061 7261  ep`: File separa
+00001c60: 746f 7220 2863 6f6d 6d61 2c20 7365 6d69  tor (comma, semi
+00001c70: 2d63 6f6c 6f6e 2c20 7461 622c 206f 7220  -colon, tab, or 
+00001c80: 616e 7920 636f 6c75 6d6e 2d73 6570 6172  any column-separ
+00001c90: 6174 696e 6720 7661 6c75 6529 2e0a 2020  ating value)..  
+00001ca0: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6064 6570 5661 7260        - `depVar`
+00001cb0: 3a20 5461 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961 626c  : Target variabl
+00001cc0: 6520 696e 2079 6f75 7220 6461 7461 7365  e in your datase
+00001cd0: 743b 206c 6561 7665 2065 6d70 7479 2069  t; leave empty i
+00001ce0: 6620 6e6f 7420 6170 706c 6963 6162 6c65  f not applicable
+00001cf0: 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6064 6674  ..        - `dft
+00001d00: 6560 3a20 496e 7075 7420 6461 7461 6672  e`: Input datafr
+00001d10: 616d 6520 666f 7220 706c 6f74 7469 6e67  ame for plotting
+00001d20: 2063 6861 7274 733b 206c 6561 7665 2065   charts; leave e
+00001d30: 6d70 7479 2069 6620 7072 6f76 6964 696e  mpty if providin
+00001d40: 6720 6120 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 2e0a 2020  g a filename..  
+00001d50: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6068 6561 6465 7260        - `header`
+00001d60: 3a20 526f 7720 6e75 6d62 6572 206f 6620  : Row number of 
+00001d70: 7468 6520 6865 6164 6572 2072 6f77 2069  the header row i
+00001d80: 6e20 796f 7572 2066 696c 6520 2830 2066  n your file (0 f
+00001d90: 6f72 2074 6865 2066 6972 7374 2072 6f77  or the first row
+00001da0: 292e 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 7665  )..        - `ve
+00001db0: 7262 6f73 6560 3a20 3020 666f 7220 6d69  rbose`: 0 for mi
+00001dc0: 6e69 6d61 6c20 696e 666f 2061 6e64 2063  nimal info and c
+00001dd0: 6861 7274 732c 2031 2066 6f72 206d 6f72  harts, 1 for mor
+00001de0: 6520 696e 666f 2061 6e64 2063 6861 7274  e info and chart
+00001df0: 732c 206f 7220 3220 666f 7220 7361 7669  s, or 2 for savi
+00001e00: 6e67 2063 6861 7274 7320 6c6f 6361 6c6c  ng charts locall
+00001e10: 7920 7769 7468 6f75 7420 6469 7370 6c61  y without displa
+00001e20: 792e 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 6c6f  y..        - `lo
+00001e30: 7765 7373 603a 2055 7365 2072 6567 7265  wess`: Use regre
+00001e40: 7373 696f 6e20 6c69 6e65 7320 666f 7220  ssion lines for 
+00001e50: 6561 6368 2070 6169 7220 6f66 2063 6f6e  each pair of con
+00001e60: 7469 6e75 6f75 7320 7661 7269 6162 6c65  tinuous variable
+00001e70: 7320 6167 6169 6e73 7420 7468 6520 7461  s against the ta
+00001e80: 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961 626c 6520 696e  rget variable in
+00001e90: 2073 6d61 6c6c 2064 6174 6173 6574 733b   small datasets;
+00001ea0: 2061 766f 6964 2075 7369 6e67 2066 6f72   avoid using for
+00001eb0: 206c 6172 6765 2064 6174 6173 6574 7320   large datasets 
+00001ec0: 283e 3130 302c 3030 3020 726f 7773 292e  (>100,000 rows).
+00001ed0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 6368 6172  .        - `char
+00001ee0: 745f 666f 726d 6174 603a 2027 7376 6727  t_format`: 'svg'
+00001ef0: 2c20 2770 6e67 272c 2027 6a70 6727 2c20  , 'png', 'jpg', 
+00001f00: 2762 6f6b 6568 272c 2027 7365 7276 6572  'bokeh', 'server
+00001f10: 272c 206f 7220 2768 746d 6c27 2066 6f72  ', or 'html' for
+00001f20: 2064 6973 706c 6179 696e 6720 6f72 2073   displaying or s
+00001f30: 6176 696e 6720 6368 6172 7473 2069 6e20  aving charts in 
+00001f40: 7661 7269 6f75 7320 666f 726d 6174 732c  various formats,
+00001f50: 2064 6570 656e 6469 6e67 206f 6e20 7468   depending on th
+00001f60: 6520 7665 7262 6f73 6520 6f70 7469 6f6e  e verbose option
+00001f70: 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 606d 6178  ..        - `max
+00001f80: 5f72 6f77 735f 616e 616c 797a 6564 603a  _rows_analyzed`:
+00001f90: 204c 696d 6974 2074 6865 206d 6178 206e   Limit the max n
+00001fa0: 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2072 6f77 7320 666f  umber of rows fo
+00001fb0: 7220 6368 6172 7420 6469 7370 6c61 792c  r chart display,
+00001fc0: 2070 6172 7469 6375 6c61 726c 7920 7573   particularly us
+00001fd0: 6566 756c 2066 6f72 2076 6572 7920 6c61  eful for very la
+00001fe0: 7267 6520 6461 7461 7365 7473 2028 6d69  rge datasets (mi
+00001ff0: 6c6c 696f 6e73 206f 6620 726f 7773 2920  llions of rows) 
+00002000: 746f 2072 6564 7563 6520 6368 6172 7420  to reduce chart 
+00002010: 6765 6e65 7261 7469 6f6e 2074 696d 652e  generation time.
+00002020: 2041 2073 7461 7469 7374 6963 616c 6c79   A statistically
+00002030: 2076 616c 6964 2073 616d 706c 6520 7769   valid sample wi
+00002040: 6c6c 2062 6520 7573 6564 2e0a 2020 2020  ll be used..    
+00002050: 2020 2020 2d20 606d 6178 5f63 6f6c 735f      - `max_cols_
+00002060: 616e 616c 797a 6564 603a 204c 696d 6974  analyzed`: Limit
+00002070: 2074 6865 206e 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2063   the number of c
+00002080: 6f6e 7469 6e75 6f75 7320 7661 7269 6162  ontinuous variab
+00002090: 6c65 7320 746f 2062 6520 616e 616c 797a  les to be analyz
+000020a0: 6564 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6073  ed..        - `s
+000020b0: 6176 655f 706c 6f74 5f64 6972 603a 2044  ave_plot_dir`: D
+000020c0: 6972 6563 746f 7279 2066 6f72 2073 6176  irectory for sav
+000020d0: 696e 6720 706c 6f74 732e 2044 6566 6175  ing plots. Defau
+000020e0: 6c74 2069 7320 4e6f 6e65 2c20 7768 6963  lt is None, whic
+000020f0: 6820 7361 7665 7320 706c 6f74 7320 756e  h saves plots un
+00002100: 6465 7220 7468 6520 6375 7272 656e 7420  der the current 
+00002110: 6469 7265 6374 6f72 7920 696e 2061 2073  directory in a s
+00002120: 7562 666f 6c64 6572 206e 616d 6564 2041  ubfolder named A
+00002130: 7574 6f56 697a 5f50 6c6f 7473 2e20 4966  utoViz_Plots. If
+00002140: 2074 6865 2073 6176 655f 706c 6f74 5f64   the save_plot_d
+00002150: 6972 2064 6f65 736e 2774 2065 7869 7374  ir doesn't exist
+00002160: 2c20 6974 2077 696c 6c20 6265 2063 7265  , it will be cre
+00002170: 6174 6564 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 0a20  ated..        . 
+00002180: 2020 2020 2020 2023 2320 4578 616d 706c         ## Exampl
+00002190: 6573 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2048 6572 6520  es.        Here 
+000021a0: 6172 6520 736f 6d65 2065 7861 6d70 6c65  are some example
+000021b0: 7320 746f 2068 656c 7020 796f 7520 6765  s to help you ge
+000021c0: 7420 7374 6172 7465 6420 7769 7468 2041  t started with A
+000021d0: 7574 6f56 697a 2e20 4966 2079 6f75 206e  utoViz. If you n
+000021e0: 6565 6420 6675 6c6c 206a 7570 7974 6572  eed full jupyter
+000021f0: 206e 6f74 6562 6f6f 6b73 2077 6974 6820   notebooks with 
+00002200: 636f 6465 2073 616d 706c 6573 2074 6865  code samples the
+00002210: 7920 6361 6e20 6265 2066 6f75 6e64 2069  y can be found i
+00002220: 6e20 5b65 7861 6d70 6c65 735d 2868 7474  n [examples](htt

+00001330: 6c61 7373 2e20 4e6f 7465 3a20 596f 7520  lass. Note: You 
+00001340: 6e6f 206c 6f6e 6765 7220 6e65 6564 2074  no longer need t
+00001350: 6f20 7573 6520 6060 6066 726f 6d20 6175  o use ```from au

+00001380: 697a 5f43 6c61 7373 6060 602e 2049 6e73  iz_Class```. Ins

+00001410: 2041 7574 6f56 697a 2061 6e79 2069 6e70   AutoViz any inp
+00001420: 7574 2066 696c 656e 616d 6520 2869 6e20  ut filename (in

+000017d0: 2320 4150 490d 0a41 7267 756d 656e 7473  # API..Arguments
+000017e0: 2066 6f72 2060 4156 2e41 7574 6f56 697a   for `AV.AutoViz
+000017f0: 2829 6020 6d65 7468 6f64 3a0d 0a0d 0a2d  ()` method:....-
+00001800: 2060 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 603a 2055 7365   `filename`: Use
+00001810: 2061 6e20 656d 7074 7920 7374 7269 6e67   an empty string
+00001820: 2028 2222 2920 6966 2074 6865 7265 2773   ("") if there's
+00001830: 206e 6f20 6173 736f 6369 6174 6564 2066   no associated f

+000018d0: 4669 6c65 2073 6570 6172 6174 6f72 2028  File separator (
+000018e0: 636f 6d6d 612c 2073 656d 692d 636f 6c6f  comma, semi-colo

+00001900: 6f6c 756d 6e2d 7365 7061 7261 7469 6e67  olumn-separating
+00001910: 2076 616c 7565 292e 0d0a 2d20 6064 6570   value)...- `dep

+00001940: 7461 7365 743b 206c 6561 7665 2065 6d70  taset; leave emp
+00001950: 7479 2069 6620 6e6f 7420 6170 706c 6963  ty if not applic
+00001960: 6162 6c65 2e0d 0a2d 2060 6466 7465 603a  able...- `dfte`:
+00001970: 2049 6e70 7574 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65   Input dataframe
+00001980: 2066 6f72 2070 6c6f 7474 696e 6720 6368   for plotting ch
+00001990: 6172 7473 3b20 6c65 6176 6520 656d 7074  arts; leave empt
+000019a0: 7920 6966 2070 726f 7669 6469 6e67 2061  y if providing a
+000019b0: 2066 696c 656e 616d 652e 0d0a 2d20 6068   filename...- `h
+000019c0: 6561 6465 7260 3a20 526f 7720 6e75 6d62  eader`: Row numb
+000019d0: 6572 206f 6620 7468 6520 6865 6164 6572  er of the header
+000019e0: 2072 6f77 2069 6e20 796f 7572 2066 696c   row in your fil
+000019f0: 6520 2830 2066 6f72 2074 6865 2066 6972  e (0 for the fir
+00001a00: 7374 2072 6f77 292e 0d0a 2d20 6076 6572  st row)...- `ver
+00001a10: 626f 7365 603a 2030 2066 6f72 206d 696e  bose`: 0 for min
+00001a20: 696d 616c 2069 6e66 6f20 616e 6420 6368  imal info and ch

+00001a40: 2069 6e66 6f20 616e 6420 6368 6172 7473   info and charts
+00001a50: 2c20 6f72 2032 2066 6f72 2073 6176 696e  , or 2 for savin
+00001a60: 6720 6368 6172 7473 206c 6f63 616c 6c79  g charts locally
+00001a70: 2077 6974 686f 7574 2064 6973 706c 6179   without display
+00001a80: 2e0d 0a2d 2060 6c6f 7765 7373 603a 2055  ...- `lowess`: U
+00001a90: 7365 2072 6567 7265 7373 696f 6e20 6c69  se regression li
+00001aa0: 6e65 7320 666f 7220 6561 6368 2070 6169  nes for each pai
+00001ab0: 7220 6f66 2063 6f6e 7469 6e75 6f75 7320  r of continuous

+00001ad0: 7420 7468 6520 7461 7267 6574 2076 6172  t the target var

+00001af0: 6174 6173 6574 733b 2061 766f 6964 2075  atasets; avoid u
+00001b00: 7369 6e67 2066 6f72 206c 6172 6765 2064  sing for large d
+00001b10: 6174 6173 6574 7320 283e 3130 302c 3030  atasets (>100,00
+00001b20: 3020 726f 7773 292e 0d0a 2d20 6063 6861  0 rows)...- `cha
+00001b30: 7274 5f66 6f72 6d61 7460 3a20 2773 7667  rt_format`: 'svg
+00001b40: 272c 2027 706e 6727 2c20 276a 7067 272c  ', 'png', 'jpg',
+00001b50: 2027 626f 6b65 6827 2c20 2773 6572 7665   'bokeh', 'serve
+00001b60: 7227 2c20 6f72 2027 6874 6d6c 2720 666f  r', or 'html' fo
+00001b70: 7220 6469 7370 6c61 7969 6e67 206f 7220  r displaying or

+00001b90: 2076 6172 696f 7573 2066 6f72 6d61 7473   various formats
+00001ba0: 2c20 6465 7065 6e64 696e 6720 6f6e 2074  , depending on t
+00001bb0: 6865 2076 6572 626f 7365 206f 7074 696f  he verbose optio
+00001bc0: 6e2e 0d0a 2d20 606d 6178 5f72 6f77 735f  n...- `max_rows_
+00001bd0: 616e 616c 797a 6564 603a 204c 696d 6974  analyzed`: Limit
+00001be0: 2074 6865 206d 6178 206e 756d 6265 7220   the max number 
+00001bf0: 6f66 2072 6f77 7320 666f 7220 6368 6172  of rows for char

+00001c20: 6f72 2076 6572 7920 6c61 7267 6520 6461  or very large da

+00001c80: 2073 616d 706c 6520 7769 6c6c 2062 6520   sample will be 
+00001c90: 7573 6564 2e0d 0a2d 2060 6d61 785f 636f  used...- `max_co

+00001d70: 697a 5f50 6c6f 7473 2e20 4966 2074 6865  iz_Plots. If the
+00001d80: 2073 6176 655f 706c 6f74 5f64 6972 2064   save_plot_dir d
+00001d90: 6f65 736e 2774 2065 7869 7374 2c20 6974  oesn't exist, it
+00001da0: 2077 696c 6c20 6265 2063 7265 6174 6564   will be created
+00001db0: 2e0d 0a0d 0a23 2320 4578 616d 706c 6573  .....## Examples
+00001dc0: 0d0a 4865 7265 2061 7265 2073 6f6d 6520  ..Here are some 
+00001dd0: 6578 616d 706c 6573 2074 6f20 6865 6c70  examples to help

+00001df0: 2077 6974 6820 4175 746f 5669 7a2e 2049   with AutoViz. I
+00001e00: 6620 796f 7520 6e65 6564 2066 756c 6c20  f you need full 
+00001e10: 6a75 7079 7465 7220 6e6f 7465 626f 6f6b  jupyter notebook
+00001e20: 7320 7769 7468 2063 6f64 6520 7361 6d70  s with code samp
+00001e30: 6c65 7320 7468 6579 2063 616e 2062 6520  les they can be 
+00001e40: 666f 756e 6420 696e 205b 6578 616d 706c  found in [exampl

+00001e80: 7465 722f 4578 616d 706c 6573 2920 666f  ter/Examples) fo
+00001e90: 6c64 6572 2e0d 0a0d 0a23 2323 2045 7861  lder.....### Exa
+00001ea0: 6d70 6c65 2031 3a20 5669 7375 616c 697a  mple 1: Visualiz
+00001eb0: 6520 6120 4353 5620 6669 6c65 2077 6974  e a CSV file wit
+00001ec0: 6820 6120 7461 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961  h a target varia
+00001ed0: 626c 650d 0a0d 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e  ble....```python

+00001ef0: 6d70 6f72 7420 4175 746f 5669 7a5f 436c  mport AutoViz_Cl

+00001f10: 7a5f 436c 6173 7328 290d 0a0d 0a66 696c  z_Class()....fil
+00001f20: 656e 616d 6520 3d20 2279 6f75 725f 6669  ename = "your_fi

+00001f70: 746f 5669 7a28 0d0a 2020 2020 6669 6c65  toViz(..    file

+00001fa0: 7461 7267 6574 5f76 6172 6961 626c 652c  target_variable,
+00001fb0: 0d0a 2020 2020 6466 7465 3d4e 6f6e 652c  ..    dfte=None,
+00001fc0: 0d0a 2020 2020 6865 6164 6572 3d30 2c0d  ..    header=0,.
+00001fd0: 0a20 2020 2076 6572 626f 7365 3d31 2c0d  .    verbose=1,.
+00001fe0: 0a20 2020 206c 6f77 6573 733d 4661 6c73  .    lowess=Fals
+00001ff0: 652c 0d0a 2020 2020 6368 6172 745f 666f  e,..    chart_fo
+00002000: 726d 6174 3d22 7376 6722 2c0d 0a20 2020  rmat="svg",..   
+00002010: 206d 6178 5f72 6f77 735f 616e 616c 797a   max_rows_analyz
+00002020: 6564 3d31 3530 3030 302c 0d0a 2020 2020  ed=150000,..    
+00002030: 6d61 785f 636f 6c73 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65  max_cols_analyze
+00002040: 643d 3330 2c0d 0a20 2020 2073 6176 655f  d=30,..    save_
+00002050: 706c 6f74 5f64 6972 3d4e 6f6e 650d 0a29  plot_dir=None..)
+00002060: 0d0a 6060 600d 0a0d 0a21 5b76 6172 5f63  ..```....![var_c
+00002070: 6861 7274 735d 2869 6d61 6765 732f 7661  harts](images/va
+00002080: 725f 6368 6172 7473 2e4a 5047 290d 0a0d  r_charts.JPG)...
+00002090: 0a23 2323 2045 7861 6d70 6c65 2032 3a20  .### Example 2: 
+000020a0: 5669 7375 616c 697a 6520 6120 5061 6e64  Visualize a Pand
+000020b0: 6173 2044 6174 6146 7261 6d65 2077 6974  as DataFrame wit
+000020c0: 686f 7574 2061 2074 6172 6765 7420 7661  hout a target va
+000020d0: 7269 6162 6c65 3a0d 0a0d 0a60 6060 7079  riable:....```py
+000020e0: 7468 6f6e 0d0a 696d 706f 7274 2070 616e  thon..import pan
+000020f0: 6461 7320 6173 2070 640d 0a66 726f 6d20  das as pd..from 
+00002100: 6175 746f 7669 7a20 696d 706f 7274 2041  autoviz import A
+00002110: 7574 6f56 697a 5f43 6c61 7373 0d0a 0d0a  utoViz_Class....
+00002120: 4156 203d 2041 7574 6f56 697a 5f43 6c61  AV = AutoViz_Cla
+00002130: 7373 2829 0d0a 0d0a 6461 7461 203d 207b  ss()....data = {
+00002140: 2763 6f6c 3127 3a20 5b31 2c20 322c 2033  'col1': [1, 2, 3
+00002150: 2c20 342c 2035 5d2c 2027 636f 6c32 273a  , 4, 5], 'col2':
+00002160: 205b 352c 2034 2c20 332c 2032 2c20 315d   [5, 4, 3, 2, 1]
+00002170: 7d0d 0a64 6620 3d20 7064 2e44 6174 6146  }..df = pd.DataF
+00002180: 7261 6d65 2864 6174 6129 0d0a 0d0a 6466  rame(data)....df
+00002190: 7420 3d20 4156 2e41 7574 6f56 697a 280d  t = AV.AutoViz(.
+000021a0: 0a20 2020 2022 222c 0d0a 2020 2020 7365  .    "",..    se
+000021b0: 703d 222c 222c 0d0a 2020 2020 6465 7056  p=",",..    depV
+000021c0: 6172 3d22 222c 0d0a 2020 2020 6466 7465  ar="",..    dfte
+000021d0: 3d64 662c 0d0a 2020 2020 6865 6164 6572  =df,..    header
+000021e0: 3d30 2c0d 0a20 2020 2076 6572 626f 7365  =0,..    verbose
+000021f0: 3d31 2c0d 0a20 2020 206c 6f77 6573 733d  =1,..    lowess=
+00002200: 4661 6c73 652c 0d0a 2020 2020 6368 6172  False,..    char
+00002210: 745f 666f 726d 6174 3d22 7365 7276 6572  t_format="server
+00002220: 222c 0d0a 2020 2020 6d61 785f 726f 7773  ",..    max_rows
+00002230: 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65 643d 3135 3030 3030  _analyzed=150000
+00002240: 2c0d 0a20 2020 206d 6178 5f63 6f6c 735f  ,..    max_cols_
+00002250: 616e 616c 797a 6564 3d33 302c 0d0a 2020  analyzed=30,..

-00001a50: 2020 2023 2320 4150 490a 2020 2020 2020     ## API.      
-00001a60: 2020 4172 6775 6d65 6e74 7320 666f 7220    Arguments for 
-00001a70: 6041 562e 4175 746f 5669 7a28 2960 206d  `AV.AutoViz()` m
-00001a80: 6574 686f 643a 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a  ethod:.        .
-00001a90: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6066 696c 656e          - `filen
-00001aa0: 616d 6560 3a20 5573 6520 616e 2065 6d70  ame`: Use an emp
-00001ab0: 7479 2073 7472 696e 6720 2822 2229 2069  ty string ("") i
-00001ac0: 6620 7468 6572 6527 7320 6e6f 2061 7373  f there's no ass
-00001ad0: 6f63 6961 7465 6420 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65  ociated filename
-00001ae0: 2061 6e64 2079 6f75 2077 616e 7420 746f   and you want to
-00001af0: 2075 7365 2061 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65   use a dataframe
-00001b00: 3b20 7365 7420 6466 7465 2061 7320 7468  ; set dfte as th
-00001b10: 6520 6461 7461 6672 616d 6520 6e61 6d65  e dataframe name
-00001b20: 2e20 5072 6f76 6964 6520 6120 6669 6c65  . Provide a file
-00001b30: 6e61 6d65 2061 6e64 206c 6561 7665 2064  name and leave d
-00001b40: 6674 6520 656d 7074 7920 746f 206c 6f61  fte empty to loa
-00001b50: 6420 7468 6520 6461 7461 7365 742e 0a20  d the dataset.. 
-00001b60: 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 7365 7060 3a20         - `sep`: 
-00001b70: 4669 6c65 2073 6570 6172 6174 6f72 2028  File separator (
-00001b80: 636f 6d6d 612c 2073 656d 692d 636f 6c6f  comma, semi-colo
-00001b90: 6e2c 2074 6162 2c20 6f72 2061 6e79 2063  n, tab, or any c
-00001ba0: 6f6c 756d 6e2d 7365 7061 7261 7469 6e67  olumn-separating
-00001bb0: 2076 616c 7565 292e 0a20 2020 2020 2020   value)..       
-00001bc0: 202d 2060 6465 7056 6172 603a 2054 6172   - `depVar`: Tar
-00001bd0: 6765 7420 7661 7269 6162 6c65 2069 6e20  get variable in 
-00001be0: 796f 7572 2064 6174 6173 6574 3b20 6c65  your dataset; le
-00001bf0: 6176 6520 656d 7074 7920 6966 206e 6f74  ave empty if not
-00001c00: 2061 7070 6c69 6361 626c 652e 0a20 2020   applicable..   
-00001c10: 2020 2020 202d 2060 6466 7465 603a 2049       - `dfte`: I
-00001c20: 6e70 7574 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65 2066  nput dataframe f

-00001c50: 6966 2070 726f 7669 6469 6e67 2061 2066  if providing a f
-00001c60: 696c 656e 616d 652e 0a20 2020 2020 2020  ilename..       
-00001c70: 202d 2060 6865 6164 6572 603a 2052 6f77   - `header`: Row
-00001c80: 206e 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2074 6865 2068   number of the h
-00001c90: 6561 6465 7220 726f 7720 696e 2079 6f75  eader row in you
-00001ca0: 7220 6669 6c65 2028 3020 666f 7220 7468  r file (0 for th
-00001cb0: 6520 6669 7273 7420 726f 7729 2e0a 2020  e first row)..  
-00001cc0: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6076 6572 626f 7365        - `verbose
-00001cd0: 603a 2030 2066 6f72 206d 696e 696d 616c  `: 0 for minimal
-00001ce0: 2069 6e66 6f20 616e 6420 6368 6172 7473   info and charts
-00001cf0: 2c20 3120 666f 7220 6d6f 7265 2069 6e66  , 1 for more inf
-00001d00: 6f20 616e 6420 6368 6172 7473 2c20 6f72  o and charts, or
-00001d10: 2032 2066 6f72 2073 6176 696e 6720 6368   2 for saving ch
-00001d20: 6172 7473 206c 6f63 616c 6c79 2077 6974  arts locally wit
-00001d30: 686f 7574 2064 6973 706c 6179 2e0a 2020  hout display..  
-00001d40: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 606c 6f77 6573 7360        - `lowess`
-00001d50: 3a20 5573 6520 7265 6772 6573 7369 6f6e  : Use regression
-00001d60: 206c 696e 6573 2066 6f72 2065 6163 6820   lines for each

-00001d90: 696e 7374 2074 6865 2074 6172 6765 7420  inst the target 
-00001da0: 7661 7269 6162 6c65 2069 6e20 736d 616c  variable in smal
-00001db0: 6c20 6461 7461 7365 7473 3b20 6176 6f69  l datasets; avoi
-00001dc0: 6420 7573 696e 6720 666f 7220 6c61 7267  d using for larg
-00001dd0: 6520 6461 7461 7365 7473 2028 3e31 3030  e datasets (>100
-00001de0: 2c30 3030 2072 6f77 7329 2e0a 2020 2020  ,000 rows)..    
-00001df0: 2020 2020 2d20 6063 6861 7274 5f66 6f72      - `chart_for

-00001e10: 6727 2c20 276a 7067 272c 2027 626f 6b65  g', 'jpg', 'boke

-00001fe0: 6f72 7920 666f 7220 7361 7669 6e67 2070  ory for saving p

-00002000: 204e 6f6e 652c 2077 6869 6368 2073 6176   None, which sav

+000016e0: 436c 6173 7328 290a 2020 2020 2020 2020  Class().        
+000016f0: 6466 7420 3d20 4156 2e41 7574 6f56 697a  dft = AV.AutoViz
+00001700: 2866 696c 656e 616d 6529 0a20 2020 2020  (filename).     
+00001710: 2020 2060 6060 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a     ```.        .
+00001720: 2020 2020 2020 2020 4665 6564 2041 7574          Feed Aut
+00001730: 6f56 697a 2061 6e79 2069 6e70 7574 2066  oViz any input f
+00001740: 696c 656e 616d 6520 2869 6e20 4353 562c  ilename (in CSV,
+00001750: 2074 7874 2c20 6f72 204a 534f 4e20 666f   txt, or JSON fo
+00001760: 726d 6174 292c 2061 6e64 2073 6574 2060  rmat), and set `
+00001770: 6d61 785f 726f 7773 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65  max_rows_analyze
+00001780: 6460 2061 6e64 2060 6d61 785f 636f 6c73  d` and `max_cols
+00001790: 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65 6460 2062 6173 6564  _analyzed` based
+000017a0: 206f 6e20 6d65 6d6f 7279 206c 696d 6974   on memory limit
+000017b0: 6174 696f 6e73 2069 6e20 796f 7572 2065  ations in your e
+000017c0: 6e76 6972 6f6e 6d65 6e74 2c20 616e 6420  nvironment, and 
+000017d0: 7761 7463 6820 7468 6520 6d61 6769 6320  watch the magic 
+000017e0: 6861 7070 656e 210a 2020 2020 2020 2020  happen!.        
+000017f0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2041 7574 6f56 697a  .        AutoViz
+00001800: 2063 616e 206e 6f77 2063 7265 6174 6520   can now create 
+00001810: 6368 6172 7473 2069 6e20 6d75 6c74 6970  charts in multip
+00001820: 6c65 2020 666f 726d 6174 7320 7573 696e  le  formats usin
+00001830: 6720 7468 6520 6063 6861 7274 5f66 6f72  g the `chart_for
+00001840: 6d61 7460 2073 6574 7469 6e67 3a0a 2020  mat` setting:.  
+00001850: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 4966 2060 6368 6172        - If `char
+00001860: 745f 666f 726d 6174 203d 2770 6e67 2760  t_format ='png'`
+00001870: 206f 7220 6027 7376 6727 6020 6f72 2060   or `'svg'` or `
+00001880: 276a 7067 2760 3a20 4d61 7470 6c6f 746c  'jpg'`: Matplotl
+00001890: 6962 2063 6861 7274 7320 6172 6520 706c  ib charts are pl
+000018a0: 6f74 7465 6420 696e 6c69 6e65 2e0a 2020  otted inline..  
+000018b0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2a20 4361 6e20            * Can 
+000018c0: 6265 2073 6176 6564 206c 6f63 616c 6c79  be saved locally
+000018d0: 2028 7573 696e 6720 6076 6572 626f 7365   (using `verbose
+000018e0: 3d32 6020 7365 7474 696e 6729 206f 7220  =2` setting) or 
+000018f0: 6469 7370 6c61 7965 6420 2860 7665 7262  displayed (`verb
+00001900: 6f73 653d 3160 2920 696e 204a 7570 7974  ose=1`) in Jupyt
+00001910: 6572 204e 6f74 6562 6f6f 6b73 2e0a 2020  er Notebooks..  
+00001920: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2a20 5468 6973            * This
+00001930: 2069 7320 7468 6520 6465 6661 756c 7420   is the default 
+00001940: 6265 6861 7669 6f72 2066 6f72 2041 7574  behavior for Aut
+00001950: 6f56 697a 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20  oViz..        - 
+00001960: 4966 2060 6368 6172 745f 666f 726d 6174  If `chart_format
+00001970: 3d27 626f 6b65 6827 603a 2049 6e74 6572  ='bokeh'`: Inter
+00001980: 6163 7469 7665 2042 6f6b 6568 2063 6861  active Bokeh cha
+00001990: 7274 7320 6172 6520 706c 6f74 7465 6420  rts are plotted 
+000019a0: 696e 204a 7570 7974 6572 204e 6f74 6562  in Jupyter Noteb
+000019b0: 6f6f 6b73 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20  ooks..        - 
+000019c0: 4966 2060 6368 6172 745f 666f 726d 6174  If `chart_format
+000019d0: 3d27 7365 7276 6572 2760 2c20 6461 7368  ='server'`, dash
+000019e0: 626f 6172 6473 2077 696c 6c20 706f 7020  boards will pop 
+000019f0: 7570 2066 6f72 2065 6163 6820 6b69 6e64  up for each kind
+00001a00: 206f 6620 6368 6172 7420 6f6e 2079 6f75   of chart on you
+00001a10: 7220 6272 6f77 7365 722e 0a20 2020 2020  r browser..     
+00001a20: 2020 202d 2049 6620 6063 6861 7274 5f66     - If `chart_f
+00001a30: 6f72 6d61 743d 2768 746d 6c27 602c 2069  ormat='html'`, i
+00001a40: 6e74 6572 6163 7469 7665 2042 6f6b 6568  nteractive Bokeh
+00001a50: 2063 6861 7274 7320 7769 6c6c 2062 6520   charts will be 
+00001a60: 6372 6561 7465 6420 616e 6420 7369 6c65  created and sile
+00001a70: 6e74 6c79 2073 6176 6564 2061 7320 4854  ntly saved as HT
+00001a80: 4d4c 2066 696c 6573 2075 6e64 6572 2074  ML files under t
+00001a90: 6865 2060 4175 746f 5669 7a5f 506c 6f74  he `AutoViz_Plot
+00001aa0: 7360 2064 6972 6563 746f 7279 2028 756e  s` directory (un
+00001ab0: 6465 7220 776f 726b 696e 6720 666f 6c64  der working fold
+00001ac0: 6572 2920 6f72 2061 6e79 206f 7468 6572  er) or any other
+00001ad0: 2064 6972 6563 746f 7279 2074 6861 7420   directory that 
+00001ae0: 796f 7520 7370 6563 6966 7920 7573 696e  you specify usin
+00001af0: 6720 7468 6520 6073 6176 655f 706c 6f74  g the `save_plot
+00001b00: 5f64 6972 6020 7365 7474 696e 6720 2864  _dir` setting (d
+00001b10: 7572 696e 6720 696e 7075 7429 2e0a 2020  uring input)..  
+00001b20: 2020 2020 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a        .        .
+00001b30: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2323 2041 5049 0a20          ## API. 
+00001b40: 2020 2020 2020 2041 7267 756d 656e 7473         Arguments
+00001b50: 2066 6f72 2060 4156 2e41 7574 6f56 697a   for `AV.AutoViz
+00001b60: 2829 6020 6d65 7468 6f64 3a0a 2020 2020  ()` method:.    
+00001b70: 2020 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060      .        - `
+00001b80: 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 603a 2055 7365 2061  filename`: Use a
+00001b90: 6e20 656d 7074 7920 7374 7269 6e67 2028  n empty string (
+00001ba0: 2222 2920 6966 2074 6865 7265 2773 206e  "") if there's n
+00001bb0: 6f20 6173 736f 6369 6174 6564 2066 696c  o associated fil
+00001bc0: 656e 616d 6520 616e 6420 796f 7520 7761  ename and you wa
+00001bd0: 6e74 2074 6f20 7573 6520 6120 6461 7461  nt to use a data
+00001be0: 6672 616d 653b 2073 6574 2064 6674 6520  frame; set dfte 
+00001bf0: 6173 2074 6865 2064 6174 6166 7261 6d65  as the dataframe
+00001c00: 206e 616d 652e 2050 726f 7669 6465 2061   name. Provide a
+00001c10: 2066 696c 656e 616d 6520 616e 6420 6c65   filename and le
+00001c20: 6176 6520 6466 7465 2065 6d70 7479 2074  ave dfte empty t
+00001c30: 6f20 6c6f 6164 2074 6865 2064 6174 6173  o load the datas
+00001c40: 6574 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6073  et..        - `s
+00001c50: 6570 603a 2046 696c 6520 7365 7061 7261  ep`: File separa
+00001c60: 746f 7220 2863 6f6d 6d61 2c20 7365 6d69  tor (comma, semi
+00001c70: 2d63 6f6c 6f6e 2c20 7461 622c 206f 7220  -colon, tab, or 
+00001c80: 616e 7920 636f 6c75 6d6e 2d73 6570 6172  any column-separ
+00001c90: 6174 696e 6720 7661 6c75 6529 2e0a 2020  ating value)..  
+00001ca0: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6064 6570 5661 7260        - `depVar`
+00001cb0: 3a20 5461 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961 626c  : Target variabl
+00001cc0: 6520 696e 2079 6f75 7220 6461 7461 7365  e in your datase
+00001cd0: 743b 206c 6561 7665 2065 6d70 7479 2069  t; leave empty i
+00001ce0: 6620 6e6f 7420 6170 706c 6963 6162 6c65  f not applicable
+00001cf0: 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6064 6674  ..        - `dft
+00001d00: 6560 3a20 496e 7075 7420 6461 7461 6672  e`: Input datafr
+00001d10: 616d 6520 666f 7220 706c 6f74 7469 6e67  ame for plotting
+00001d20: 2063 6861 7274 733b 206c 6561 7665 2065   charts; leave e
+00001d30: 6d70 7479 2069 6620 7072 6f76 6964 696e  mpty if providin
+00001d40: 6720 6120 6669 6c65 6e61 6d65 2e0a 2020  g a filename..  
+00001d50: 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6068 6561 6465 7260        - `header`
+00001d60: 3a20 526f 7720 6e75 6d62 6572 206f 6620  : Row number of 
+00001d70: 7468 6520 6865 6164 6572 2072 6f77 2069  the header row i
+00001d80: 6e20 796f 7572 2066 696c 6520 2830 2066  n your file (0 f
+00001d90: 6f72 2074 6865 2066 6972 7374 2072 6f77  or the first row
+00001da0: 292e 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 7665  )..        - `ve
+00001db0: 7262 6f73 6560 3a20 3020 666f 7220 6d69  rbose`: 0 for mi
+00001dc0: 6e69 6d61 6c20 696e 666f 2061 6e64 2063  nimal info and c
+00001dd0: 6861 7274 732c 2031 2066 6f72 206d 6f72  harts, 1 for mor
+00001de0: 6520 696e 666f 2061 6e64 2063 6861 7274  e info and chart
+00001df0: 732c 206f 7220 3220 666f 7220 7361 7669  s, or 2 for savi
+00001e00: 6e67 2063 6861 7274 7320 6c6f 6361 6c6c  ng charts locall
+00001e10: 7920 7769 7468 6f75 7420 6469 7370 6c61  y without displa
+00001e20: 792e 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 6c6f  y..        - `lo
+00001e30: 7765 7373 603a 2055 7365 2072 6567 7265  wess`: Use regre
+00001e40: 7373 696f 6e20 6c69 6e65 7320 666f 7220  ssion lines for 
+00001e50: 6561 6368 2070 6169 7220 6f66 2063 6f6e  each pair of con
+00001e60: 7469 6e75 6f75 7320 7661 7269 6162 6c65  tinuous variable
+00001e70: 7320 6167 6169 6e73 7420 7468 6520 7461  s against the ta
+00001e80: 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961 626c 6520 696e  rget variable in
+00001e90: 2073 6d61 6c6c 2064 6174 6173 6574 733b   small datasets;
+00001ea0: 2061 766f 6964 2075 7369 6e67 2066 6f72   avoid using for
+00001eb0: 206c 6172 6765 2064 6174 6173 6574 7320   large datasets 
+00001ec0: 283e 3130 302c 3030 3020 726f 7773 292e  (>100,000 rows).
+00001ed0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 202d 2060 6368 6172  .        - `char
+00001ee0: 745f 666f 726d 6174 603a 2027 7376 6727  t_format`: 'svg'
+00001ef0: 2c20 2770 6e67 272c 2027 6a70 6727 2c20  , 'png', 'jpg', 
+00001f00: 2762 6f6b 6568 272c 2027 7365 7276 6572  'bokeh', 'server
+00001f10: 272c 206f 7220 2768 746d 6c27 2066 6f72  ', or 'html' for
+00001f20: 2064 6973 706c 6179 696e 6720 6f72 2073   displaying or s
+00001f30: 6176 696e 6720 6368 6172 7473 2069 6e20  aving charts in 
+00001f40: 7661 7269 6f75 7320 666f 726d 6174 732c  various formats,
+00001f50: 2064 6570 656e 6469 6e67 206f 6e20 7468   depending on th
+00001f60: 6520 7665 7262 6f73 6520 6f70 7469 6f6e  e verbose option
+00001f70: 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 606d 6178  ..        - `max
+00001f80: 5f72 6f77 735f 616e 616c 797a 6564 603a  _rows_analyzed`:
+00001f90: 204c 696d 6974 2074 6865 206d 6178 206e   Limit the max n
+00001fa0: 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2072 6f77 7320 666f  umber of rows fo
+00001fb0: 7220 6368 6172 7420 6469 7370 6c61 792c  r chart display,
+00001fc0: 2070 6172 7469 6375 6c61 726c 7920 7573   particularly us
+00001fd0: 6566 756c 2066 6f72 2076 6572 7920 6c61  eful for very la
+00001fe0: 7267 6520 6461 7461 7365 7473 2028 6d69  rge datasets (mi
+00001ff0: 6c6c 696f 6e73 206f 6620 726f 7773 2920  llions of rows) 
+00002000: 746f 2072 6564 7563 6520 6368 6172 7420  to reduce chart 
+00002010: 6765 6e65 7261 7469 6f6e 2074 696d 652e  generation time.
+00002020: 2041 2073 7461 7469 7374 6963 616c 6c79   A statistically
+00002030: 2076 616c 6964 2073 616d 706c 6520 7769   valid sample wi
+00002040: 6c6c 2062 6520 7573 6564 2e0a 2020 2020  ll be used..    
+00002050: 2020 2020 2d20 606d 6178 5f63 6f6c 735f      - `max_cols_
+00002060: 616e 616c 797a 6564 603a 204c 696d 6974  analyzed`: Limit
+00002070: 2074 6865 206e 756d 6265 7220 6f66 2063   the number of c
+00002080: 6f6e 7469 6e75 6f75 7320 7661 7269 6162  ontinuous variab
+00002090: 6c65 7320 746f 2062 6520 616e 616c 797a  les to be analyz
+000020a0: 6564 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2d20 6073  ed..        - `s
+000020b0: 6176 655f 706c 6f74 5f64 6972 603a 2044  ave_plot_dir`: D
+000020c0: 6972 6563 746f 7279 2066 6f72 2073 6176  irectory for sav
+000020d0: 696e 6720 706c 6f74 732e 2044 6566 6175  ing plots. Defau
+000020e0: 6c74 2069 7320 4e6f 6e65 2c20 7768 6963  lt is None, whic
+000020f0: 6820 7361 7665 7320 706c 6f74 7320 756e  h saves plots un
+00002100: 6465 7220 7468 6520 6375 7272 656e 7420  der the current 
+00002110: 6469 7265 6374 6f72 7920 696e 2061 2073  directory in a s
+00002120: 7562 666f 6c64 6572 206e 616d 6564 2041  ubfolder named A
+00002130: 7574 6f56 697a 5f50 6c6f 7473 2e20 4966  utoViz_Plots. If
+00002140: 2074 6865 2073 6176 655f 706c 6f74 5f64   the save_plot_d
+00002150: 6972 2064 6f65 736e 2774 2065 7869 7374  ir doesn't exist
+00002160: 2c20 6974 2077 696c 6c20 6265 2063 7265  , it will be cre
+00002170: 6174 6564 2e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 0a20  ated..        . 
+00002180: 2020 2020 2020 2023 2320 4578 616d 706c         ## Exampl
+00002190: 6573 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2048 6572 6520  es.        Here 
+000021a0: 6172 6520 736f 6d65 2065 7861 6d70 6c65  are some example
+000021b0: 7320 746f 2068 656c 7020 796f 7520 6765  s to help you ge
+000021c0: 7420 7374 6172 7465 6420 7769 7468 2041  t started with A
+000021d0: 7574 6f56 697a 2e20 4966 2079 6f75 206e  utoViz. If you n
+000021e0: 6565 6420 6675 6c6c 206a 7570 7974 6572  eed full jupyter
+000021f0: 206e 6f74 6562 6f6f 6b73 2077 6974 6820   notebooks with

+00002270: 2020 2020 2020 200a 2020 2020 2020 2020         .        
+00002280: 2323 2320 4578 616d 706c 6520 313a 2056  ### Example 1: V
+00002290: 6973 7561 6c69 7a65 2061 2043 5356 2066  isualize a CSV f
+000022a0: 696c 6520 7769 7468 2061 2074 6172 6765  ile with a targe

+000022c0: 2020 200a 2020 2020 2020 2020 6060 6070     .        ```p
+000022d0: 7974 686f 6e0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 6672  ython.        fr
+000022e0: 6f6d 2061 7574 6f76 697a 2069 6d70 6f72  om autoviz impor

+00002300: 2020 2020 2020 2020 4156 203d 2041 7574          AV = Aut

+00002330: 6c65 6e61 6d65 203d 2022 796f 7572 5f66  lename = "your_f
+00002340: 696c 652e 6373 7622 0a20 2020 2020 2020  ile.csv".       
+00002350: 2074 6172 6765 745f 7661 7269 6162 6c65   target_variable
+00002360: 203d 2022 796f 7572 5f74 6172 6765 745f   = "your_target_
+00002370: 7661 7269 6162 6c65 220a 2020 2020 2020  variable".      
+00002380: 2020 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2064 6674 203d    .        dft =
+00002390: 2041 562e 4175 746f 5669 7a28 0a20 2020   AV.AutoViz(.   
+000023a0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2066 696c 656e 616d           filenam
+000023b0: 652c 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2073  e,.            s

+000023d0: 2020 2020 6465 7056 6172 3d74 6172 6765      depVar=targe
+000023e0: 745f 7661 7269 6162 6c65 2c0a 2020 2020  t_variable,.    
+000023f0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 6466 7465 3d4e 6f6e          dfte=Non
+00002400: 652c 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2068  e,.            h
+00002410: 6561 6465 723d 302c 0a20 2020 2020 2020  eader=0,.       
+00002420: 2020 2020 2076 6572 626f 7365 3d31 2c0a       verbose=1,.
+00002430: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 6c6f 7765              lowe
+00002440: 7373 3d46 616c 7365 2c0a 2020 2020 2020  ss=False,.      
+00002450: 2020 2020 2020 6368 6172 745f 666f 726d        chart_form
+00002460: 6174 3d22 7376 6722 2c0a 2020 2020 2020  at="svg",.      
+00002470: 2020 2020 2020 6d61 785f 726f 7773 5f61        max_rows_a
+00002480: 6e61 6c79 7a65 643d 3135 3030 3030 2c0a  nalyzed=150000,.
+00002490: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 6d61 785f              max_
+000024a0: 636f 6c73 5f61 6e61 6c79 7a65 643d 3330  cols_analyzed=30
+000024b0: 2c0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 7361  ,.            sa
+000024c0: 7665 5f70 6c6f 745f 6469 723d 4e6f 6e65  ve_plot_dir=None
+000024d0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2029 0a20 2020 2020  .        ).     
+000024e0: 2020 2060 6060 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a     ```.        .
+000024f0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 215b 7661 725f 6368          ![var_ch
+00002500: 6172 7473 5d28 696d 6167 6573 2f76 6172  arts](images/var

+00002520: 2020 2020 200a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2323       .        ##
+00002530: 2320 4578 616d 706c 6520 323a 2056 6973  # Example 2: Vis
+00002540: 7561 6c69 7a65 2061 2050 616e 6461 7320  ualize a Pandas 
+00002550: 4461 7461 4672 616d 6520 7769 7468 6f75  DataFrame withou
+00002560: 7420 6120 7461 7267 6574 2076 6172 6961  t a target varia
+00002570: 626c 653a 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a 2020  ble:.        .  
+00002580: 2020 2020 2020 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a        ```python.
+00002590: 2020 2020 2020 2020 696d 706f 7274 2070          import p
+000025a0: 616e 6461 7320 6173 2070 640a 2020 2020  andas as pd.    
+000025b0: 2020 2020 6672 6f6d 2061 7574 6f76 697a      from autoviz
+000025c0: 2069 6d70 6f72 7420 4175 746f 5669 7a5f   import AutoViz_

+000025e0: 2020 2020 2020 2041 5620 3d20 4175 746f         AV = Auto
+000025f0: 5669 7a5f 436c 6173 7328 290a 2020 2020  Viz_Class().

+00002610: 6120 3d20 7b27 636f 6c31 273a 205b 312c  a = {'col1': [1,

+00002630: 6f6c 3227 3a20 5b35 2c20 342c 2033 2c20  ol2': [5, 4, 3, 
+00002640: 322c 2031 5d7d 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2064  2, 1]}.        d

+00002660: 2864 6174 6129 0a20 2020 2020 2020 200a  (data).        .
+00002670: 2020 2020 2020 2020 6466 7420 3d20 4156          dft = AV
+00002680: 2e41 7574 6f56 697a 280a 2020 2020 2020  .AutoViz(.      
+00002690: 2020 2020 2020 2222 2c0a 2020 2020 2020        "",.      
+000026a0: 2020 2020 2020 7365 703d 222c 222c 0a20        sep=",",. 
+000026b0: 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2064 6570 5661             depVa
+000026c0: 723d 2222 2c0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  r="",.          
+000026d0: 2020 6466 7465 3d64 662c 0a20 2020 2020    dfte=df,.     
+000026e0: 2020 2020 2020 2068 6561 6465 723d 302c         header=0,
+000026f0: 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2076 6572  .            ver
+00002700: 626f 7365 3d31 2c0a 2020 2020 2020 2020  bose=1,.        
+00002710: 2020 2020 6c6f 7765 7373 3d46 616c 7365      lowess=False
+00002720: 2c0a 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020 6368  ,.            ch
+00002730: 6172 745f 666f 726d 6174 3d22 7365 7276  art_format="serv
+00002740: 6572 222c 0a20 2020 2020 2020 2020 2020  er",.

+00002760: 6564 3d31 3530 3030 302c 0a20 2020 2020  ed=150000,.     
+00002770: 2020 2020 2020 206d 6178 5f63 6f6c 735f         max_cols_
